offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Sheffield attempted to steal WASHING MACHINE to the value of 750.00, belonging to Hopper May.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.

offences.offenceSummary: On 01/01/2016 at London assaulted Medina Brown by beating him.
offences.act: Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.

offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Liverpool attempted to steal FLAT SCREEN TV to the value of 750.00, belonging to Cleveland Pena.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
